description:
Since 2010, the law office of PJ Campanaro Attorney at Law has offered compassionate family law counsel to people in Evans, Georgia, and throughout the surrounding areas. Our experience includes representing clients in a wide range of domestic matters, including those involving divorce, child custody, fathers' rights, adoption, and domestic violence and neglect. We accept credit cards for our clients' convenience.

Our law office is sensitive to the emotional stress and upset, as well as the financial strain, that domestic legal matters can cause our clients and their families. We are sensitive to what our clients and their children are going through, and work with those we represent to develop customized strategies that incorporate their specific needs, concerns and goals. Our attorney strives to help our clients achieve favorable resolutions to their legal problems as efficiently as possible, so they and their families can begin the process of rebuilding.

We believe that clients should be an integral part of the planning and decision-making process when it comes to handling their cases. Beginning with a free initial consultation, we talk with people about their unique family dynamics, legal objectives and expectations, advising them of their options and the potential outcomes of each.

In addition to family law matters, our attorney at the law office of PJ Campanaro Attorney at Law provides personal injury claims and criminal law representation to clients. Aggressively advocating on behalf of our clients' rights and best interests, we handle cases involving car accidents, trucking accidents, medical malpractice, premises liability and wrongful death, as well as traffic tickets, DUI and DWI charges, drug violations, sex offenses and white collar crimes.
